title.narrative: Projet de gestion des fonds de crédits des WLSEE-BtB

description.narrative: 5 vegetable producing groups and 7 WLSEEs (2 vegetable processing; 2 rice processing; 2 milk processing; 1 energy shop) are the main benificiaires of the project. In Burkina, all SET introduced will include both solar PV and thermal systems. For rice and milk processing, introduced SET will be powered also by biogas using biodigestors and cow dung and household waste. Vegetable processing WLSEEs will produce dried tomatoes, potatoes, onions, and leaves of non-timber forest products (baobab, balanites, etc.), while rice processing WLSEEs will produce an increased production of better quality steamed rice, as well as manure, biogas, and solar energy which will enable clients to recharge their lamps or mobile phones. Milk processing WLSEEs will produce and sell energy services and pasteurized milk, yogurt, and fresh, dry traditional milk preparations (Gapalt & Dégué). The funds will be transfer in each account according to the 12 agreed business plans.
